Headline: Midway-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at 35th/Archer
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at 35th/Archer due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at 35th/Archer due to signal problems.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/Indiana
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Bishop Ford, 115th, and Michigan due to street blockage at 130th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 130th, Bishop Ford, 115th, and Michigan due to street blockage at 130th/Indiana.

Allow extra travel time.
